General.Name: Parsvnath Developers Limited
General.Description: Parsvnath Developers Limited engages in the real estate development business in India. The company promotes, constructs, and develops integrated townships, residential and commercial complexes, multistoried buildings, flats, houses, apartments, shopping malls, IT parks, hotels, special economic zones, etc. It also offers leasing and maintenance services; and recreational facilities. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in New Delhi, India.
